text: KQIS (1340 AM) is a radio station licensed to serve the community of Bethel Heights, Arkansas. The station is owned by Perry Publishing and Broadcasting, through licensee Perry Broadcasting of Arkansas, Inc. It airs a rhythmic contemporary hit radio format. The station was assigned the call sign KFMD by the Federal Communications Commission on December 13, 2012. The station changed its call sign to KQIS on December 31, 2015. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website * QIS (AM) Category:Radio stations established in 2013 Category:2013 establishments in Arkansas Category:Rhythmic contemporary radio stations in the United States Category:Benton County, Arkansas
title: KQIS (AM)
